title: For Sale/Trade:  WINCHESTER COLLECTORS MODEL 70 SUPER GRADE AFRICAN 458 MAG
postcontent:
One owner family gun and was ordered from the Winchester Custom Shop in January of 1964 and was purchased from Builders Hardware here in Charlotte. It was ordered with the following upgrades.
Grade 3 wood instead of the grade 2 that came standard on Super Grades.
Winchester Custom Shop Island Express safari sights.
KICKEEZ recoil pad.
The rifle has fantastic wood with lots of color and figure and only very minor handling marks. The bluing is mint and only has a small rub on the floor plate. The bore is mint and the rifling looks like it was cut yesterday. I know for a fact the gun has been fired less than 50 times. Comes with the original dealer hanging tag and owners manual. The rifle has been well cared for.
Also comes with a hand fitted Browning model 1915 safari case that was purchased in the early 70s. The case is mint with the Browning instruction manual and care card and both locking keys. I have seen some of these for sale in the past but not one in this condition with all paper work and both keys. Rifle also comes with a Torel hand tooled Cape Buffalo sling that was purchased along with the case. One box of vintage Winchester Western 458 solids and one box of empty's. I don't think you could ever find another custom Super Grade transitional rifle this complete or in this condition.

title: For Sale:  Mossberg .22 LR AR15 Clone Model 715T Tactical California Compliant 37200 variant Fixed Buttstock 10 round magazine NIB
postcontent: Our # LG37200 Here is the best looking AR-15 .22 on the market, Mossberg’s 715T. Manufacturer is CBC of Ribeirão Pires, Brazil, the company that brought us the excellent Nylon 66 clones back in the 1980s. Importer and warrantor is Mossberg International of New Haven, CT, and Eagle Pass, Texas. Type is blowback action rimfire semi automatic. Chambering is .22 Long Rifle caliber, high velocity ammunition. Construction is steel one piece barrel, bolt, trigger, hammer, and internal parts built into a lightweight alloy main receiver, and all encased in a polymer AR15 style platform. Barrel is 18 inch medium .635 outside diameter, 1:16 six groove right hand bore. Sights are fixed post front, with windage and A2 style elevation adjustable single blade aperture rear, both shielded in cosmetic polymer. Scope base is a factory issue Tapco polymer detachable 12 slot Picatinny. Forend assembly is a 24 slot Picatinny Quad-rail type, to hold any number of optical or light devices. Upper and lower rails are forend integral, but laterals are 3 screw detachable. Forward sling swivel is 1 1/4 inch barrel mounted, with a steel QD stud in the buttstock. Bolt operating handle is extended serrated face with lock position; the upper shroud integral rear handle is cosmetic. Trigger is .230 smooth faced steel two stage, pulls at 5 pound vicinity with moderate felt movement and overtravel. Safety is push button type, forward of the trigger for a right handed shooter, non reversable. Magazine release is ambidextrous, with an appearance similar to a selector lever. Buttstock is factory issue ATI non collapsible, length of pull set on 13 inches. Buttstock laterals have 3 1/2 inch spaced twin female screw anchor recesses for add ons. Overall length is 36 5/8 inches. Weight empty is 5 pounds 2 ounces, with center of gravity at the breech face. Each rifle comes in its original box with protective papers, safety flyers, factory lock, and instruction manual that includes Mossberg’s 10 year warranty statement. Replacement pricing on similar rifles from competitors Colt, Ruger, and Smith & Wesson approach $500 apiece. title: For Sale:  Armscor Rock Island .22 LR M1600 AR15 Copy or Trainer NIB 10 Shot Magazine Armscor Precision API 22 Long Rifle Caliber 51111
postcontent: Our # LG51111 Here is the original M-16 trainer introduced during the Reagan Era, and wildly popular during the Bush Sr / Clinton Ban Years. This M-1600 is manufactured by Armscor of the Philippines, the company that brings us their excellent 1911 pistols that perform so very well. Action type is, of course, blowback semi-auto, and it is a direct descendant of the Remington 550-1 rifles that are still in service after 60 years. Sights are correct aperture rear and post front with authentic carry handle and gas housing replicas. Magazines are 10 round blue steel, housed in a correct-looking and fitting AR-15 type housing. Extra 10, 15, and even 25 shot magazines are in production, and we stock them when we can get them. Forend and buttstock are classic Colt SP-1 Vietnam Era styling black ebony stained hardwood with removable vertical pistol grip. The forend configuration allows barrel exposure for better heat dissipation. Shoppers note that the pistol grip installs easily with furnished bolt, same way with the sling. Barrel is 18 1/4 inch blue steel with 1:16 rifling, and receiver is blued steel as well. Weight empty is a well balanced 6 1/2 pounds. We have sold substantial numbers of this brand rifle with good results since the 1970s, when the 550-1 phased out and the Filipino manufacturers filled the gap with a good quality economically priced rifle marketed under the Squibman and K-Mart brands, then Armscor. ARMSCOR uses, writes the factory, only high grade ordnance steel for all major parts for durability and mechanical reliability even in the most adverse operating conditions. Instruction manual and magazine indicates high velocity .22 ammo; our local customers have always had best results with Winchester, Federal, and Aguila coppercoated ammunition. title: For Sale:  Kel-Tec KSG 12ga Shotgun
postcontent:
***We ship our firearms nation wide where they are legal***

***We do NOT charge credit card fees***

This item for sale is a NIB Kel-Tec KSG 12 gauge pump action shotgun for $899.99 + tax if you are an Indiana resident (+ shipping if you are unable to come in to the store. We do NOT charge credit card fees). 
We are an FFL operating out of South Bend Indiana and we ship all over the country. Our store front is open! We are located at 2604 S Main st. in South Bend Indiana and share a facility with Mark's Auto Care Center. If you're local, feel free to stop by! Our hours are M-F: 9am to 530pm and Saturday: 9am to 2pm. We care closed on Sunday.
We are also certified DuraCoat re-finishers. We can professionally re-finish almost any firearm in our inventory or in yours with a variety of colors and camo patterns! Whether it be OD-green, FDE, hot pink, zebra stripe, your initials, or a variety of other options, we are the guys for the job! We provide a 5 year warranty on all of our finish work. Please visit us at www.tzarmory.com or www.facebook.com/tzarmory to check out our other firearms for sale and other firearm finishes that we've done!

Product Information, Features, Specifications:

This simple and reliable pump action feeds from either the left or right tube. The feed side is manually selected by a lever located behind the trigger guard.

The pump includes an under picatinny rail for the mounting of a forward grip, a light, or a laser. The included top picatinny sight rail will accept many types of optics or iron sights. Forward and rear sling loops are built in, and a basic sling is included. The soft rubber butt pad helps to tame recoil.

The KSG receiver is made from hardened steel and includes the magazine tubes which have been welded in place. The grip and stock assembly is made of glass reinforced nylon (Zytel) and is easily disassembled by pushing out 2 pins, which store in 2 holes in the grip when removed. The barrel and pump assembly is removed by loosening the 2 front magazine tube nuts with a coin and sliding the assembly forward.

title: For Sale:  45 ACP +P Remington 185 BJHP Golden Saber 125 round Lots of 5 Boxes $15.80 x 5 45 Automatic Black Talon type Bronze Jacketed Hollow Point Ammunition Cartridges GS45APC
postcontent: Our # AMGS45APC Restrictions apply on ammunition orders, please read this entire ad carefully before bidding or offering to buy. This listing is for FIVE Boxes, a total of 125 cartridges or rounds; winning buyer, however, may take any number of additional five box lots we have on hand at the same per-box price and no extra shipping. Do the math. Remington Golden Saber ammunition comes 25 cartridges to the box, not 20 rounds like competitors Federal, Winchester, PMC, and Mag-tech. That’s 20 percent more ammo for your money. Here is Remington's unmatched high performance load for the .45 Automatic, its Golden Saber 185 grain Bronze Jacketed Hollowpoint. Here is what Remington says about the Golden Saber line: Remington's Golden Saber High Performance Jacket (HPJ) ammunition is designed for law enforcement and personal defense, and it successfully combines match-type accuracy, deep penetration, maximum expansion, and near 100% weight retention. This HPJ handgun ammunition was built around revolutionary hollow-point bullet design, and the jacket is made entirely of cartridge brass, which releases energy over longer distances while mushrooming. Primer and mouth-waterproofing are standard, and the spiral nose-cut feature permits mushrooming at lower velocity without sacrificing penetration or terminal performance. The cases are nickel-plated for reliable feed, function, and extraction. This load is the 185 grain BJHP, Bronze Jacketed Hollow Point. It clocks out of a 5 inch Government barrel at 1140 fps, and delivers a magnum-grade 534 foot pounds of energy at the muzzle. These fine cartridges come 25 to the box, enough to charge two magazines for a Glock 21, a Taurus 24/7, or a Springfield Armory XD. Similar loads from competing manufacturers fetch $1.50 to $2.00 per cartridge. We're offering what few we have, however, at only 63 cents a round, in Five Box Lots at $15.80 per box. Own 5 boxes, total of 125 rounds, for only $ 79.00. Shipping. $15.00 flat fee shipping lower 48 for the whole order. No Returns on Ammunition. Bids and offers to buy must be for the registered user only. Don’t buy for your buddies, that kind of thing smells like a felony level straw purchase attempt for guns or ammunition. Magazines and any small light non-gun items ride free with ammo orders. MasterCard/Visa/USPS Money Order paid orders shipped ASAP. 14 day hold on checks. Signed ammo statement and legible photo ID copy showing your current address required for shipment to non-dealer civilians, see the form among this ad’s photos. Illinois residents must provide a FOID card copy too. May be faxed or scanned and emailed. We cannot ship ammunition to Alaska, Hawaii, or Puerto Rico. No direct shipments to non-dealer civilians in Chicago Aurora or Oak Park IL; Non-CCW licensees in Marin County CA; Los Angeles Oakland or San Francisco in California; D.C.;Massachusetts; New York City or any other jurisdiction that requires in-person signatures, thumbprints, etc., for civilian buyers of ammunition. title: For Sale:  ATI .45 ACP American Tactical FX45 1911 Combat Commander Size Rail Ambidextrous Safety Novak Sights 4 3/4 in Threaded 45 Automatic Parkerized NIB One 8 shot magazine Series 70 style no FP Block
postcontent: Our # HGATIGFX45K We’ve dealt Philippine Made 1911s now for 30 years, they are more tried and more true than their upstart Brazilian competitors who’ve only been at it for a decade. This offering is for American Tactical’s new FX1911 Tactical Commander type .45, a pistol that holds its traditional looks and lines while incorporating custom features. Manufacturer is Shooters Arms Manufacturing Company, S.A.M., of Mandaue City, Philippines, with the same family of corporate ownership as Armscor of the Philippines. Importer and Warrantor is American Tactical Imports formerly of Rochester, New York, but now well thawed in Summerville, South Carolina. Construction is all 4140 steel slide and frame, with traditional military parkerized finish and silver inlay slide marking. Barrel is 4 3/4 inch Extended Commander Length, left hand 1:16 rifling in the bore. The extra half inch is for the muzzle threads, protective cap, or legally owned suppressor device. Hammer is Matte Blue Commander style .250 wide, and with matching skeleton serrated face steel trigger. Photo specimen pulled at 7 pounds, with minimal felt creep. Sights are Novak type black combat, dovetailed front and rear. Frame incorporates a 3 slot Picatinny rail for light or laser. Main safety is extended ambidextrous, with beavertail grip safety. Mainspring Housing is B type round serrated. This variant is series 70 style in that it does NOT have a firing pin safety, no firing pin block. This pistol comes furnished with a total of one 8 shot blue steel Italian Act-Mag magazine. Grips are checkered surface black wood. This pistol is an exceptional value. Replacement pricing on similarly equipped 1911s is upwards of $1000 apiece in our area. We’re offering the S.A.M. / ATI Tactical FX 1911 Commander in the photos, however, or one of its identical mates for only $ 439.00. Not transferable to civilian residents of California, Connecticut, Massachusetts, New York, or any jurisdiction where threaded barrels are restricted to law enforcement only. title: For Sale:  Winchester 1887 Replica 12 gauge 20 inch Cylinder Blue & Hardwood Terminator Rosebox Shotgun 2 3/4 inch 5 Shot NIB Century Arms Zongzhou Norinco
postcontent: Our # LGSG1667N Every bit as much as the future Governor of California, the co-star of the Movie Terminator 2 Judgment Day was Mr. Schwarzenegger’s Winchester Repeating Arms model of 1887 Lever Action Shotgun. The 1887 was, of course, one of John Moses Browning’s signature developments. Folk often called it the Rosebox shotgun. Here is a well executed, very slick copy of the 1887 Winchester Lever Action 12 gauge. It is made by our good friends in the world's most populous nation, imported by Interstate Arms. While Schwarzenegger’s ’87 was chambered in 10 gauge, this one is 12 gauge, chambered for 2 3/4 inch shells only. This shotgun retains the look and feel of the Old West Cowboy shotgun while constructed with modern high-tensile steel. One of our best local wildlife officers has an original Winchester that he no longer shoots, coupled with one of these that he does frequently shoot, and he vouches for these guns’ reliability. Manufacturer is Zong Zhou Machine Works of the People’s Republic of China. Importer is Century Arms in the former Republic of Vermont. Type is falling breech, tube fed lever action shotgun. Capacity is 4 + 1, overall length is a compact 38 inches; weight empty is a handy 7 pounds; and the stock and forend are American Hardwood. Barrel is 20 inch, plain bead sight, cylinder bore. While these are immensely popular in Cowboy Action Shooting, they are simple enough to operate for non-specialists. Photo shows one of only a few we were able to acquire recently after a 3 year absence from our store. Replacement price on these is upwards of $600.00 in our area, if a person can even find one. We're offering the 87W in the photos, however, or one of its identical mates each for only $ 389.00. Shipping. $20 flat fee lower 48 states; $60 Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico, UPS Ground or USPS Priority with full insurance coverage. Don’t let your buddies use your account, that kind of thing smells like felony level straw purchase attempt. NO AMEX NO PAYPAL. We accept MC/Visa/Discover/USPS MO paid orders shipped ASAP. 7 day hold on checks. FFL ok by fax, e-mail or mail, please ask your dealer to put your name and Gun Brand on there. 7 day money back on used, no return on New Items, layaway, or ammo. We do not pay transfer fees or return shipping. Lay-away 20% down, balance in 90 days. Phone hours 8:00 – 5:00 CST Mon - Fri CST. Local pickup OK. Robertson Trading Post 117 Front Street PO Box 365 Henderson, Tennessee 38340 We Buy, Sell, or Trade. We always have, since 1952.

title: For Sale:  9mm 115 gr FMC 500 Round Case of 10 Boxes Brown Bear Russian Ulyanovsk Steel Case $11.40 / Box on 10 Box Case
postcontent: Our # AM919RFMJ Restrictions apply on ammunition shipments to non dealer civilians, so please read this entire ad carefully before bidding or offering to buy. This listing is for TEN Boxes, a full factory case, Total of 500 cartridges or rounds. Buyers may take any number of extra 10 box cases we have on hand at the same per-case price and with no additional shipping charges. Ulyanovsk Machinery Plant began ammunition production in 1917, and the firm served as a principal supplier to the Soviet Military for many years. After the dissolution of the USSR, Ulyanovsk began selling on the US Commercial Market in the late 1990s under their own name. More recently, their product has come packaged as simply, Brown Bear ammunition. Here is Brown Bear’s Military Load, number A919RFMJ. Caliber is 9mm Luger, 9mm Parabellum, 9x19, call it what you will, THE 9mm. Construction is laquer coated steel case, not reloadable and with Berdan type priming system. Bullets are lead core bi-metal jacket, 115 grains. Out of a 5 inch Beretta 92, factory specs show a pretty warm 1235 feet per second muzzle velocity, with 390 foot pound vicinity muzzle energy. Garbage mouthed pistols like the CZ75 series, 92 Beretta, Ruger P series, Kel-Tecs, Smith & Wesson 39 59, and Tokarev type pistols like our Zastavas, all like this stuff. So do the well made 1911 Armscors. Glock and Sig, we are told, do not recommend steel case ammunition. We’re offering this long storing work horse ammunition in factory cases of 10 boxes, only $9.90 per box. Own a case for only $99 plus $15 ship lower 48 only. Shipping. $15.00 flat fee shipping lower 48 for the whole order. No Returns on Ammunition. Bids and offers to buy must be for the registered user only. title: For Sale:  9mm 124 grain JHP Remington 125 Round Lot of 5 Boxes Golden Saber Bronze Jacketed Hollow Point 5x$15.80 Flying Ashtray Black Talon type Ammunition Cartridges 9 Luger Parabellum 9x19 $15.80 per 25 round Box in 5 box Lots
postcontent: Our # AMGS9MMB Restrictions apply on ammunition orders, please read this entire ad carefully before bidding or offering to buy. This listing is for FIVE Boxes, a total of 125 cartridges or rounds; winning buyer, however, may take any number of additional five box lots we have on hand at the same per-box price and no extra shipping. Do the math. Remington Golden Saber ammunition comes 25 cartridges to the box, not 20 rounds like competitors Federal, Winchester, PMC, and Mag-tech. That’s 20 percent more ammo for your money. Here is Remington's unmatched high performance load for the 9mm, its Golden Saber 124 grain Bronze Jacketed Hollowpoint. Here is what Remington says about the Golden Saber line: Here is what Remington says about the Golden Saber line: Remington's Golden Saber High Performance Jacket (HPJ) ammunition is designed for law enforcement and personal defense, and it successfully combines match-type accuracy, deep penetration, maximum expansion, and near 100% weight retention. This HPJ handgun ammunition was built around revolutionary hollow-point bullet design, and the jacket is made entirely of cartridge brass, which releases energy over longer distances while mushrooming. Primer and mouth-waterproofing are standard, and the spiral nose-cut feature permits mushrooming at lower velocity without sacrificing penetration or terminal performance. The cases are nickel-plated for reliable feed, function, and extraction. This load is the 124 grain BJHP, Bronze Jacketed Hollow Point. It clocks out of a 5 inch Beretta at 1125 fps, and delivers a magnum-grade 349 foot pounds of energy at the muzzle. title: For Sale:  Taurus .45 / .410 Circuit Judge Rossi Braztech 45 Long Colt and 3 inch 410 gauge interchangeably Stainless 18 inch 5 Shot NIB SCJ4510SS Revolving Rifle / Shotgun
postcontent: Our # LGSCJ4510SS Not since the Beals Carbines of the late 1800s has anything like this come onto the market. Here is Taurus’s highly popular Judge Revolver format converted into a revolving carbine that has shotgun capability. Manufacturer is Amadeo Rossi of Sao Leopoldo, Brazil, a Taurus affiliate; this .45 / .410 is marked Made In Brazil By Taurus. Metal construction is entirely steel, stainless finish except for the hard chrome trigger and hammer. To keep everybody comfortable, Taurus left its barrel at 18 1/2 inch with a .455 cylinder bore choke tube when its operator is using Shotshells. Bore is shallow rifled, 6 groove right hand 1:18, well capable of stabilizing .454, .455, and .457 diameter bullets. Chambering is .45 Colt Caliber, but the enormous appealing aspect of this firearm is its capability of handling 2 1/2 inch and 3 inch .410 gauge shotgun shells. Capacity is 5 rounds. It also includes a two shot plug for when the operator might want to hunt federally regulated migratory birds, including the corvus brachyrhynchos, the American Crow. Sights are black anodized screw on ramp front with red high visibility fiber optic insert, and 700 type windage and elevation adjustable rear with green fiber optic dot picture. Stock and forend are oil finish Brazilian Hardwood. Trigger is .312 smooth faced, with matching serrated spur hammer that contains Taurus’s lock mechanism. Cylinder setup is thumb latch swingout, with detent on the front yoke of the necessarily long cylinder. Note the off arm protector gas shield on the lower portion of the cylinder that helps guard against right hand shooters getting their left wrist burned. Receiver is outfitted with a removable 6 slot black Weaver or Picatinny Scope or Optic Base. Weight empty is 4 1/2 pounds, and the photo specimen, our first one, had a length of pull of 14 1/8 inches from the trigger face to the end of the 1 inch black recoil pad. This firearm is legal for white tail deer in Tennessee, for instance, with the Colt or .410 Slugs, and in Mississippi with .410 Buckshot loads. It is against the law to shoot snakes, so don’t put your wildlife officers on the spot doing that. Each Circuit Judge comes in its factory box with instruction manual, safety brochure, warranty statement and factory registration card, protective papers, total of two choke tubes and wrench, two keys for its hammer lock, and adjustment tools. Replacement pricing on this rifle in our area is $600 or more, and one rarely sees them. Current wholesale is well above $500. We’re offering the Stainless Circuit Judge in the photos, however, or one of its identical mates, for a limited time, for only $489.00. Shipping. $20 flat fee lower 48 states; $60 Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico, UPS Ground or USPS Priority with full insurance coverage. Don’t let your buddies use your account, that kind of thing smells like felony level straw purchase attempt. NO AMEX NO PAYPAL. We accept MC/Visa/Discover/USPS MO paid orders shipped ASAP. 7 day hold on checks. FFL ok by fax, e-mail or mail, please ask your dealer to put your name and Gun Brand on there. 7 day money back on used, no return on New Items, layaway, or ammo. We do not pay transfer fees or return shipping. Lay-away 20% down, balance in 90 days. Phone hours 8:00 – 5:00 CST Mon - Fri CST. Local pickup OK. Robertson Trading Post 117 Front Street PO Box 365 Henderson, Tennessee 38340 We Buy, Sell, or Trade. We always have, since 1952.
